titleStmt.title: Divine cordials: delivered in ten sermons, upon part of the ninth and tenth chapters of Ezra, in a time of visitation. By that godly and faithfull preacher of Gods Word, Iosiah Shute, B.D. and late rector of Mary Woolnoths in Lumbard-Street London. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Shute, Josias, 1588-1643.
Reynoldes, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the sign of the Kings head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Pauls Church-yard, at the sign of the Kings head
